title: New Fortinet RCE bug is actively exploited, CISA confirms
description: CISA confirmed today that attackers are actively exploiting a critical remote code execution (RCE) bug patched by Fortinet on Thursday. [...]

title: Canada to ban the Flipper Zero to stop surge in car thefts
description: The Canadian government plans to ban the Flipper Zero and similar devices after tagging them as tools thieves can use to steal cars. [...]

title: Microsoft: Outlook clients not syncing over Exchange ActiveSync
description: Microsoft warned Outlook for Microsoft 365 users that clients might have issues connecting to email servers via Exchange ActiveSync after a January update. [...]

title: New RustDoor macOS malware impersonates Visual Studio update
description: A new Rust-based macOS malware spreading as a Visual Studio update to provide backdoor access to compromised systems uses infrastructure linked to the infamous ALPHV/BlackCat ransomware gang. [...]

title: Americans lost record $10 billion to fraud in 2023, FTC warns
description: The U.S. Federal Trade Commission (FTC) says Americans lost over $10 billion to scammers in 2023, marking a 14% increase in reported losses compared to the previous year. [...]
